website_summaries.verdict: A budget option from a well-known brand perfect for parties or picnics.
pros: The cooling gel chills wine fast and folds down flat, making it perfect to bring along for a romantic picnic
The design ensures that the sleeve cools evenly and fits comfortably around most bottles
Doesn't produce as much condensation as a traditional ice bucket
cons: Requires six hours in the freezer to work

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the single best wine-related investments I've made. It keeps white wine from un-chilling itself as you sit at the table engaging in long-winded conversation, and even more importantly, greatly reduces the amount of time you need to pre-chill your wine in the freezer/refrigerator. Slap it on a bottle of pinot noir and bring it down to 60F in a few minutes. I have gotten my money's worth out of this product, that is certain.
customer_reviews.author: Lash LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely, hasn' leaked
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely at keeping 24oz Pepsi bottle cool. Hasn't leaked. No complaints. I also bought another brand with velcro. Like it very much as well. I prefer the velcro one because it wraps even bigger bottles, up to 42oz. But this Vacu is still a good product, worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our whites cold on even the hottest outdoor days
customer_reviews.text: We keep our VacuVins in the top drawer of our freezer and when the whites come out so do the VacuVins. We usually eat on our patio in the summers and the last glass is even colder than the first. We LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The cooler sleeve works great to keep an already chilled bottle cool
customer_reviews.text: The cooler sleeve works great to keep an already chilled bottle cool. We have used the sleeve while enjoy wine In the warm sun and fine that it works perfectly. We actually purchased a total of three to enjoy multiple bottles! A much have if you like to enjoy chilled wine In an outdoor setting. Note: We did try it in a room temperature bottle and found that it chilled the wine a bit, but did not make as cold as if it we refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works but not like it said it would. I wouldn’t call it a rapid chiller but more of an overall wine sleeve to keep it cool while you have it sitting out.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Spencer Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and compact
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one! Does the job - keeps the bottle cool - and is easy to store in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ginotonix

customer_reviews.title: very handy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for years for keeping white wine chilled at the table. One of them bought many years ago, finally got too ragged to be very attractive on the table. This new design fits the wine bottle more snugly ( which is a good thing) ad is more neutral in design. a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Warm White Wine
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve (used outdoors) barely kept the chilled wine cold - from the start. I used the ice pack for sports injuries instead and it worked much better. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: RMNYC

customer_reviews.title: the moment I took it out it warmed up and couldn't keep the bottle of wine cool.
customer_reviews.text: It has been 1 month in the freezer. the moment I took it out it warmed up and couldn't keep the bottle of wine cool.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Yurubi

customer_reviews.title: chills one bottle...than it looses it's mojo.  For a party, you might want to own 2.
customer_reviews.text: chills one bottle...than it looses it's mojo. For a party, you might want to own 2.
customer_reviews.author: O Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: I thought that it would be as pictured and have a nice pattern on the surface
customer_reviews.text: Very plain, I thought that it would be as pictured and have a nice pattern on the surface...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold long
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this wine cooler. It thaws out quickly--especially outdoors. I think the insulation is too thin or something along those lines. We've had similar ones before and they seemed to do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to slightly chill reds and to further cool whites I've had in the fridge. Works great both ways. It won't take the place of putting the bottle in the fridge for a few hours but works well in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS ORDER WAS TO REPLACE ONE LEFT AT A FUNCTION. NO WHITE WINE DRINKER SHOULD BE WITHOUT ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient way to keep your wine cool
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I like my bubbly and white wine to be very cold when I drink it, but I don't like opening the fridge everytime i want another glass. The options are to get an ice bucket which is big and messy and uses a ton of ice. Or you can through a couple of these in your freezer and you have an ice chiller any time. They are flexible so that i have never found a bottle that this could not slide over. If you like drinking cold wine you should definitely get this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erlich

customer_reviews.title: Good wine cooler, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on most bottle sizes and does a decent job of keeping wine cool.
customer_reviews.author: QMarsha

customer_reviews.title: wine chiller
customer_reviews.text: Good wine chiller. Doesn't get a room temperature bottle cold really. But it will keep already cold wine chilled. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TeressaW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a couple of other products that quick chill wine and this was by far the simplest and least expensive. No cleaning anything up after using. Just pop it back in the freezer and it's ready to go for the next time. Not only chills the wine right in the bottle in a very short time, it also keeps the wine cold on the table. It isn't fancy, but the appearance of it certainly isn't tacky either. We love it and are glad we chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bach

customer_reviews.title: Great Item But Not in Five Minutes........
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, and it really does help to chill your wine faster. But I have yet to have my wine chilled in five minutes. I didn't really think this was possible before I bought the product, though, so it's really not a big deal. It's a great thing to have - especially if you like to leave your wine out on the table.
customer_reviews.author: P. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: wine chiller
customer_reviews.text: Needed and extra one. Great to use for picnic or home! We have a large family who all enjoy wine.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Chills wine quickly and safely. Simple to use, effective . . . what else can one say? . . . Works Well
customer_reviews.author: Y. W.

customer_reviews.title: Find another solution for  keeping your wine cool.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work all that well. I expected better cooling performance based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: perfect, but not so for champagne bottle
customer_reviews.text: it's good at home, outside, and surely on the journey, especially for summer. i wanted this for champagne or white wine of a larger bottle, but now i want to buy other item for champagne bottle anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joongho Ahn

customer_reviews.title: None of these were as superior as the Vacu Vin
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase so called wine coolers before. None of these were as superior as the Vacu Vin. I was very pleased I found them on the Amazon website. I thoroughly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to cool as well as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to cool as well as I expected. Ok for use outdoors - wish it kept my wine cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Tea Drinker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product described as chilling wine in five minutes. The "chiller" had been in my freezer for a couple of days, but did not chill the room temperature bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Anne Thrope

customer_reviews.title: Buy a few!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. We store it flat in the boat freezer and it is so versatile and handy on hot summer days...doubles as an ice pack when you get a bit overheated! Some of our friends kids put them on their arms as chilly, non-floating, floaties to quickly cool themselves off. Chills quickly, doesn't get hard and crispy. No mildew issues. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Time2Buy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It popped almost immediately and leaked goo everywhere. You get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wine Chilling the Easy Way
customer_reviews.text: What is easier than grabbing a "Vacu Vin" from the freezer (takes almost no space) and slipping it around your freshly opened bottle of Chardonay? No ice cubes, chords, water----and you always know it will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: GMA B

customer_reviews.title: wine chiller does not chill
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wine chiller a couple of times. If the wine is already cool, it holds the temperature pretty well, but does not do a lot if the wine is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: The wine cooler is great and keeps my wine cold
customer_reviews.text: I live in FL and it is hot on my patio. The wine cooler is great and keeps my wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: 76-64 degrees in 5 minutes. After 10 minutes the ...
customer_reviews.text: 76-64 degrees in 5 minutes. After 10 minutes the wine was 62 degrees. This does not 'chill' wine, but only keeps it from warming back up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: If you like chilled white wine, you need this. It also fits (kind of -- it's a bit small but we manage) on Champagne bottles. I plan to get the smaller bottle versions next.
customer_reviews.author: M. McGill

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for the wine lover
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years now and it's extremely durable. Does its job very well, keeping wine chilled for hours. Fits both Bordeaux and Burgundy bottles. Caveat: If you use this on a cold bottle, it could easily over-chill it to near-freezing. I recommend only putting this on a bottle after the bottle has been out of the fridge for 20-30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Poltorak

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it cool
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to find this nifty wine chiller. I saw this at a wine tasting an had to have one. Its been really handy keeping our white beach vino cool while spending a day at the beach or camping with friends. I've even used it for dinner parties. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was fine. Did not hold the cool temperature as long as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How'd we live without it?
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day. Keeps your wine chilled just right for a couple of hours--if it lasts that long! If you're taking a bottle to a dinner or party, this is so much handier than carrying a cooler. We also have a larger one for champagne bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great Chill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep my milk based protein shakes cold during workouts. Works like a charm, fits my shaker bottle perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Wine Chiller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Christmas gift. Tried it out before wrapping - it worked wonderfully. I will order another for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must-have for any white wine drinker. I keep it my freezer and use it all the time for entertaining. I can keep a bottle of wine out on the patio or on the countertop and it stays cold for hours. It is also great for transporting a bottle of wine and keeping it cold.
customer_reviews.author: kimw0909

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Wine Cooler Longer
customer_reviews.text: These type of chillers are great. Just keep them in the freezer for whenever you need them. They fold up nice and flat and don't take up much room. Best product for keeping wine cooler longer that I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just Chillin'
customer_reviews.text: Chills the wine very fast, and keeps it chilled for a long time. Does not take much room in your freezer when not in use - I also bought one for a neighbor and another for my brother and they also love it!
customer_reviews.author: tigger58

customer_reviews.title: Great way to chill or travel with cold wine
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these sleeves and they work very well. We take whites to parties in them or chill wines at home (works well with getting reds to cellar temp). The best thing to do for warm whites is tag team it with two sleeves. Put one one for 5-10 minutes and the second for another 5 and pow - you've got a cold wine.
customer_reviews.author: Gmaxblock

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. We have one that we accidentally left at our winter place, so went with it again as reasonably priced and effective.
customer_reviews.author: B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Best chiller in the world
customer_reviews.text: Gets room temperature wine cold in seconds and keeps things cold for a long time. Bought several for Christmas gifts and very well received by all!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Coper

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It really keeps the wine nice and cool. I wish they had a bigger size for the larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Liska-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I used it to chill and cool Water bottles.... It worked perfectly! I've always used Vacu Vin Rapid Ice products! They are very durable and nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio M M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and it does fit over a champagne bottle.
customer_reviews.author: joe in billings

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The item is small and will not expand to fit a larger bottle of wine if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Haven't really used
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use this product yet. I am looking forward to seeing how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: RBell

customer_reviews.title: Melts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Despite using pre-chilled wine, putting the whole thing (including this ice pack) inside a flexible neoprene cooler AND keeping it in the shade, this wine cooler was still completely melted within an hour of outdoor use on a warm evening outside. I don't expect hours upon hour of fuctionality, but considering the lengths I took with the extra insulation, this was disappointing. Might be ok for use inside during dinner but that's not what I'd been hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: ShereKhan0074

customer_reviews.title: keeps wine cool longer
customer_reviews.text: This item does not chill wine, but it will help to keep a chilled bottle cold for a longer period without the mess of an ice bucket. I wanted something that would keep a bottle chilled during short trips to friends' houses and it is fine for this. In an actual test. after putting the cooler in a freezer for an hour, it held a pre-chilled bottle to a five-degree rise after about twenty minutes. A bottle without the cooler warmed by more than ten degrees.
customer_reviews.author: jns

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to work
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this. Disappointed as it does not cool a room temp bottle of wine. The bottom of the bottle is the only area that feels the slightest but cold. Wine is room temp even after cold pack is no longer cold.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: to keep cool in transport
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have when you don't have access to an ice bucket. And I have also used it when I am bringing wine to a restaurant or a friend's, to keep cool in transport.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this particular product by Vacu Vin, though I really like some of their other stuff. Does not stay frozen long enough to allow you to keep your champagne bottle out in the patio on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: MGL's F&N

customer_reviews.title: Use your ice bucket for a flower pot!
customer_reviews.text: You won't need your ice bucket any longer!!! Slip the wine bottle into the chiller sleeve and worry no more. The bottle stays chilled and you no longer have to worry about the moisture ring from the ice bucket. It lays flat in the freezer so you have plenty of room for your Ben and Jerry's. I highly recommend it! In fact I'm going to pick up a second one - I prefer my red wine as well as my white chilled.
customer_reviews.author: P. Neuber

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times, but it works very well! I even chilled a warm water bottle to a near icy-drink in just a few minutes. I did find that it works much faster if you put the chiller around the drink, and then stick them in the freezer together. This way, in a few minutes you can chill down a bottle from room temperature. But if you just want to keep your already-chilled bottle cold, this works like a charm. Good price, too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Preece

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a cool bottle cool
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend it to chill a bottle, but it keeps a chilled bottle cool while you're having dinner. I always fish it out when I serve chardonnay, which I prefer well chilled.
customer_reviews.author: J Hi

customer_reviews.title: Not an accurate description...
customer_reviews.text: I put mine in the freezer for at least 5 hours. Took it out placed my wine bottle in. When I opened the bottle one and a half hours later and the wine wasn't chilled and the "chiller" part wasn't cold anymore?! I will try it again after keeping the "chiller" in the freezer all night and see if that makes a difference. When I fill my ice trays they are frozen within 5 hours, so I'm sure it was in the freezer long enough...but I will give it one more chance. So far extremely disappointed! UPDATE: No difference. I have actually thrown it away. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: marygoround9

customer_reviews.title: Chiller
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the chill while driving it to a party Do not expect it to cool a bottle of wine to serving temp I like it and recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Cold Wine-it's a good thing
customer_reviews.text: It really keeps a bottle of chilled white wine cold! Great for taking to restaurants or for drinks on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: S. Glick

customer_reviews.title: The person who received it loved it. It is a great way to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these and gave one as a present. The person who received it loved it. It is a great way to keep wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Honig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these used at at winery and found them available on Amazon. I am 100% happy with the results. It takes up a very small place in the freezer and is easy to pull out and place on my wine bottle. I did place it on a bottle of wine that had been chilled and it kept the wine chilled in 80 degree temps. I have not tried using it to chill a warm bottle, but this is definitely a good purchase and I will be giving these as gifts to other wine lovers.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieP1999

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for gifts for my whine drinking friends. They all seemed happy with the gift and said they had considered buying for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kelda Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: We have a wine fridge at home that we typically use to chill wine, but this chiller is still handy when the bottle will be sitting out for a while. It's great in the summer as well if you dine on your patio. I find it does chill the wine quickly and keeps it cool. I think they are a great inexpensive gift for those that drink and serve wine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica ADO

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! I originally bought this for my husband's "beer bottles" so when he's in the "man cave" he can have one chilling while he's drinking one. But we will also use it for our wine bottles as well. He tried it last night for his beer bottle and LOVES it! He puts the beer back in the cooler between each drink. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gooding

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WINE CHILLER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wine chiller. Fits perfectly around all wine bottles. Keeps wine chilled for hours. Great looking.
customer_reviews.author: KarenA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but my friend had a different brand that I can't find that kept the wine colder longer.
customer_reviews.author: Knl seattle

customer_reviews.title: bought more
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much, I bought another for myself and a couple for friends. I like that you can keep it on when you pour or carry it to the table. It keeps the wine chilled, without having to keep it in the frig or a bucket. I wanted another so I can have 2 bottle out and open when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: T. Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Vacu Vin
customer_reviews.text: I bought two - one for red and one for white. They don't make a warm bottle cold - just cool, but they do keep cold wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not like at
customer_reviews.text: not what i thought it would be, did not like at all

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping a bottle cold
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used this to chill a warm bottle, I've only used it to keep a chilled bottle cold while we drank it. It worked like a champ -- much easier and neater than a wine bucket, although not as romantic.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Functional & attractive design
customer_reviews.text: We use this to chill all types of items quicker, such as a Slurpee brought home that has melted a bit much, a bottle of wine, bottles of water we want to get cooler faster, bottles of soft drink, etc. Works well, nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Another Frequent Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A must for white wines.
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the freezer at all times. Chills a bottle of wine in minutes. The silver version is simple and reasonably attractive. Item arrived promptly from seller.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've had all kinds of wine coolers and collars over the years. This has turned out to be the best. I'm getting ready to order another with my next order.
customer_reviews.author: burris

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I usually only use it when I have drop in company and we want to have a glass of wine. I keep it in the freezer at all times so not sure how quickly it chills
customer_reviews.author: NNichole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good wine cooler! My wine stays ice cold fir more than 2 hrs, and fits well!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cool wine chiller!
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping wine chilled on the way to dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for outdoor dining and parties
customer_reviews.text: We love this for outdoor dining and parties! Much better than an ice bucket.

customer_reviews.title: these art great, I was happy to finally find
customer_reviews.text: these art great , I was happy to finally find them

product_meta.title: Vacu Vin Inc. Rapid Ice Active Cooler Wine Bottle Chilling Sleeve, Standard, Chrome
product_meta.description: Vacu Vin Rapid Ice Wine Coolers were developed to chill wine quickly and keep it chilled for an extended period of time, all without the need of a refrigerator or ice bucket. The cooling sleeve contains 6 pockets of specifically formulated, non-toxic gel that expands when placed in a freezer for a period of 6 hours or more. Upon removal from the freezer, the Rapid Ice Wine Cooler easily slides over the outside of the wine bottle to chill the whole bottle within 5 minutes. Once cooled, the wine will remain chilled for hours due to the multiple layers of insulated foil and foam within the sleeve. The Rapid Ice Wine Cooler is designed to fit any standard-sized wine bottle. The award-winning wine cooler is both flexible and virtually unbreakable. It is also lightweight which allows you to use it at parties, picnics, barbecues and much more! Once used, simply return the Rapid Ice Wine Cooler to the freezer to reuse over and over again! Vacu Vin was established in 1986 in Delft, the Netherlands. For over 30 years this family-owned company has evolved into the leading brand within the housewares industry, offering an array of barware accessories and kitchen gadgets that are characterized by their quality and innovative functionality. Vacu Vin’s product portfolio also includes award-winning Wine Coolers, Pineapple Slicers and other gadgets now used in over 35 million households and more than 80 countries throughout the world. A specialist, European in-house design team are constantly striving to add new items to the company’s ever-evolving product portfolio to satisfy the demands of the savvy, modern-day consumer.
feature_bullets: Chills wine within 5 minutes and keeps it cold for hours! No need for an ice bucket!
Just place the Rapid Ice Cooler in the freezer for 6 hours to activite the cooling gel. When frozen, slide the cooler onto the bottle for perfectly chilled wine in 5 minutes!
Designed to fit any standard-size wine bottle
The lightweight fold flat design allows for easy storage and allows you take it to parties, picnics, barbeques and so much more!
Developed and made in the Netherlands
